soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Cursed Claws, Baroro, increasing own ATK by 40% for 10 sec. For the duration of Skill, deals ??? P.DMG to frontral enemies every 3 sec. Hit enemies are inflicted with Curse of Baroro for 5 sex, taking 30% increased P.DMG and having their Heal Rate reduced by 30%. If the target is a Boss, the Curse of Baroro effect increases by 1.5 times.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Petrifies the hit enemy for 3 sec.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 4 times and increases the duration of the soul by 3 sec.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon using Skill 5 times.

dark: Upon dodging, all skill cooldowns are reduced by 2%. Also, ATK is boosted by 3%, and Atk Spd is boosted by 30. The ATK and Atk Spd Boosts can stack up to 10 times.

profile.likes: Fellow kinsmen, those who possess a warrior's pride

background.story: A stout and honorable warrior of the Harpies, the wielders of the power of wind. Her dignity as a Harpy warrior is more important to her than anything else in the world. She draws upon her willpower and desire to uphold her warrior's honor to bring down any enemy. Her skills are exceptional, even among her peers, and she is the ideal role model for younger Harpy warriors.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A cursed pair of gauntlets crafted from the claws of the Mad Demon Baroro, which was defeated during the war. Several times the size of the average human hands, these gauntlets directly connect to the nerves of the wearer, allowing the wielder to control them effortlessly. Although they grant immense power, they also break into the mind of the wearer, slowing eating away at the soul. Only a true warrior of noble conviction, strong will and undying spirit may handle these cursed weapons. They are the perfect weapons for a warrior with a strong will that shines even in the darkness of the abyss.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Evil Demon Baroro is a being more corrupted and dishonorable than anything else.
During the Demon war, he was defeated in a fair combat, but he never accepted the outcome. Furthermore, to prove that his lowly, dishonorable attitude is the answer, he placed himself inside the gauntlet made of his claws, Afterwards, Baroro not only devoured the mind and souls of those who used the gauntlet, but also turned them into his host, and caused even more destruction to the innocents to quench his thirst for their souls and blood. This time however, the user was not like any other Baroro came across.
Although merely a harpy, she not only withstood Baroro's mental attack, but also freely wielded the evil gauntlet.
Furthermore, her noble resolve and her brilliant will eventually overwhelm the Evil Demon. After succumbing to its master's strong mind, Baroro as an evil that devours other evil fervently vanquishes its master's enemies.
treasures: This piece of amber containing a giant tornado is a treasure of the Harpies. According to myth, a gust of wind that Divine Beast Tyrfas raised out of rage hit the sap of the holy tree, solidified, and turned into amber. Time passed, and now it's divided into several fragments, but the gust inside has not died out. Harpies consider it to be divine and call it the Soul of Gust.

The scarf that the dead Himmullis had on. Naila always has it on her. Himmullis use to always tell Naila to be proud of being a Harpy. The scarf contains the sadness of losing family, and this makes Naila furious.

A ritual offering of ancient religious people who worshipped the wind. It is a precious treasure among the Harpies, and it is said to be given to the most powerful Harpy warrior. The moment one wears this mask, they'll be able to freely use the wind. They can also attack at the speed of light.

A ribbon that holds the grace of a Wind Elemental. Selene gave this green ribbon to Naila, who wanted high speed. It contains a spell of Notos, the Wind Elemental, and it grants Naila rapid and powerful attacks.
